response.overview: The 20th installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. Every time, it is carefully selected from among the many posted videos and recorded in this work, but "Scary", "Danger" and "Super Abnormal Phenomenon" and so on. We went deeper into the background of the video and strengthened our research. This video was taken when I visited a certain shrine. It seems that the photographers visited various places on their travel destinations, but when they turn the camera at this shrine.
response.tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 20
